Title: Alma C. Wilson to Stjørdalen Sparebank 1948.3.16
Description: CARBON COPY OF A LETTER WRITTEN BY ALMA WILSON, ON BEHALF OF HER MOTHER, TO STJØRDALEN SPAREBANK (SAVINGS BANK), DATED MARCH 16 - 1948.
Creator: Alma C. Wilson
Siri Lawson, trans.
Text:
Honorable Gentlemen  I’m hereby writing you in order to find out how much money, there now is in my husband John Holm’s name there.

and what paper is needed to withdraw them from the bank there

Reply by air mail please

Do not give this money to anybody until you write and get a reply from here

tell me how much it is in American dollars, as well as in Norwegian kroner

Sincerely

Mrs. John Holm,

102 West 5 Street

Dell Rapids

South Dakota
